node.title: Victorious Overcomers, Part 1
node.description: Do you long to have the experience of Paul? "I have been crucified with Christ," the spostle declared, "and I live; yet no longer I, but Christ lives in me" (Gal 2:20). Discover how the still-available power of the Holy Spirit assists every believer in overcoming all cultivated and inherited tendencies toward sin.
